mapper.update: update public.t_user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, first_name = #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_name = #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, email_address = #{emailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar_url = #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, name, first_name, last_name, birthday, sex, email_address, phone, city, avatar_url, description, created_at, updated_at from public.t_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, name, first_name, last_name, birthday, sex, email_address, phone, city, avatar_url, description, created_at, updated_at from public.t_user
